analysis.key_quote: This proposed plan to make such positions at-will seems to be a plot to undermine the dedication and expertise of employees who have elected to work for the government on behalf of the citizens of the United States as opposed to a particular partisan administration.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about due process, merit-based protections, and the potential for politicization of civil service positions, indicating a strong alignment against the rule.
